Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)

 Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by FL, 27-Apr-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2016.)  (Proof rewritten by Jim Kingdon, 10-Jun-2018.)
statement:
cbvralf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
cbvralf.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
cbvralf.3 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvralf.4 $e |- F/ x ps $.
cbvralf.5 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
cbvrexf $p |- ( E. x e. A ph <-> E. y e. A ps ) $.
